hero.name: Jorge Oliveira
hero.pitch: Each well-crafted application is a testament to how technology can positively transform lives.

fintech.title: FinTech Dashboard
fintech.description: Complete financial management platform with real-time analysis, high processing, and microservices architecture.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Marketplace with payments, intelligent logistics, and administrative panel.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Website
restaurant.description: Responsive restaurant website with online reservations and interactive menu.

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.description: High conversion landing page with smooth animations, SEO, and performance.

finance.title: Personal Finance App
finance.description: Personal finance app with AI for automatic categorization and reports.

rpa.title: RPA Business Suite
rpa.description: Robotic process automation to reduce time on repetitive tasks.

ai.title: AI Customer Service
ai.description: Chatbots for customer service with NLP and continuous learning.

medical.title: Medical Clinic ERP
medical.description: Clinic management: schedule, medical records, and billing.

supply.title: Supply Chain ERP
supply.description: Supply ERP with intelligent inventory and demand forecasting.

beauty.title: Beauty Salon Manager
beauty.description: Salon management with online scheduling and product control.

saas.title: Micro SaaS Platform
saas.description: Creation and deployment of micro SaaS with automatic billing and analytics.

services.pageTitle: How can I help your project
services.pageDescription: Full-stack development focused on performance, accessibility and scale.

uiDesign.title: User Interface Design
uiDesign.subtitle: Clean, accessible, and intuitive interfaces
uiDesign.description: Figma interfaces with Design System, tokens and navigable prototypes. Organized hand-off for development, consistency and accessibility.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullstack.subtitle: Scalable web applications
fullstack.description: Front-end with Angular, React and Next.js; back-end with Node.js/Python. Focus on performance, SEO, accessibility (WCAG) and scalable architecture. API and database integration, CI/CD ready.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.subtitle: Fast, secure and well-documented APIs
backend.description: RESTful APIs in Node.js with PostgreSQL/MongoDB and caching, prioritizing security, scalability, and testing. OpenAPI/Swagger documentation and monitoring.

contact.pageDescription: Contact me to start your project or ask questions.
